column2: Normal disposition; initially unsure if tumor existed on spin so we did not take tumor measurements. Did necropsy and found it was a tumor that was around the spine, but not in the skin.
DCT-TVA; Braf ca; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Normal disposition; initially unsure if tumor existed on spin so we did not take tumor measurements. Did necropsy and found it was a tumor that was around the spine, but not in the skin.
Brain and skull were in tact.
